item.title: Some XAML Syntax to Remember
item.description: After developing for WPF/ Silverlight for a while, most people will be familiar with using XAML to declare UI elements, but even though I have been comfortable with XAML for quite a while, I donâ€™t really know what is going on behind the stage.
